LanguageData.FP_EnableFactionLimitTooltip: If enabled, new pawns are not saved once the limit is reached. Returning veterans are always saved.
LanguageData.FP_FactionVeteranLimitTooltip: Maximum number of veterans in the pool.\n\nSet to 0 so the mod saves ONLY the characters you manually marked (with a star).
LanguageData.FP_ShowVIPButtonTooltip: Shows the “Memory” button on the Social tab. Lets you manually save any NPC to the veteran database (bypassing limits and quest-pawn filters) and also write notes for a specific pawn if needed.
LanguageData.FP_VeteranRecallCooldownDaysTooltip: Delay before a veteran can be recalled again.
LanguageData.FP_ForcedFreezeDaysTooltip: After how many idle days to “put the pawn to sleep” for performance.
LanguageData.FP_VeteranRecallChanceTooltip: Chance to use a veteran instead of generating a new pawn.
LanguageData.FP_DeathDesc:
Annual death chance for all veterans older than 60:

• Archotech: 0.05%
• Ultratech: 0.5%
• Spacer: 1.5%
• Industrial: 2.5%
• Medieval: 5.0%
• Tribal: 7.5%

This slider scales the chances listed above.
LanguageData.FP_DiseaseDesc:
Chance to get a chronic disease per year (age 60+):

• Archotech: 0.25%
• Ultratech: 0.5%
• Spacer: 2.5%
• Industrial: 5.0%
• Medieval: 7.5%
• Tribal: 10.0%

This slider scales the chances listed above.
LanguageData.FP_ImplantDesc:
HOW IT WORKS:
1. Treatment (All tech levels): If a veteran is missing an arm, leg, or eye, the faction will install a prosthetic of its tech level (Tribal — wooden, Empire — bionic).
2. Upgrade (Industrial+): 10% chance per year to replace a healthy body part with a more efficient implant.

This slider scales the overall probability of these events.
LanguageData.FP_GeneChanceTooltip: 10% chance for a gene (Spacer+), 5% chance for an Arch-gene (Ultra+).
LanguageData.FP_AnomalyChanceTooltip: 5% chance of contact with the Void (Tribal and Medieval).
LanguageData.FP_ClearDatabaseConfirm: Are you absolutely sure you want to completely delete all veterans from the database? This action cannot be undone!
LanguageData.FP_StatusVeteran: Familiar\nI have met them before. Somewhere in the world they walk their own path, and who knows when we’ll meet again.
LanguageData.FP_StatusPinned: I’ll remember you\nYou have singled this person out from the crowd. If they leave these lands alive, their story will continue.
LanguageData.FP_StatusUnknown: Take a closer look\nIn this harsh world it’s easy to vanish without a trace. Pick them out of the crowd in hopes of meeting again.
LanguageData.FP_AlreadyInHistoryMsg: This character has already become part of the world’s history.
